Metadata: Restoration: A Newsletter about Salmon, Coastal Watersheds, and People (No. 10, 11, 12, and 13, Winter, Spring, Summer, and Fall 1997)
Oregon State University Sea Grant College Program
Four newsletter issues in one entry for 1997.

Through Restoration Newsletter, we want to help coastal residents obtain objective information so they can rise above the turmoil of the day's headlines and make well-informed choices for themselves, their communities, and their future. The following cover articles are in these issues: Winter: Toward a new vision for Pacific salmon; Spring: Survey of 500: How the coast public views salmon restoration; Summer: New NMFS report on hatcheries: Artificial propagation and coho salmon along the Oregon coast; Fall: Salmon habitat protection and landowners' property rights.
